title: IP Lost
body:
hi guys,
i wanted to ask where to complain if your IP vanishes off after a game. i was going to buy a champ and and all of sudden match found came and after the game i saw my IP is low. I am not sure about it.

replies.body: I purchased my last champ of 3150 IP on 8/9/2016 as per purchase history. I tried to check my match history online but it doesn't show the IP earned. so, i couldn't calculate the IP. Maybe i am wrong.

There are rare occurrences where you make a purchase, the IP is removed from your account, but the client doesn't sync with the server to update your IP balance afterwards. Often when you win a match or attempt to make a purchase, your balance will update after syncing with the server again. Double check your purchase history, and if you see anything fishy, let me know.

{{champion:105}}
